title: Day 114: Two Ways to Live
description: Psalm 50:16–23, Joshua 5:13–15, 7:20–22, Luke 22:39–62. ’Jesus himself said that – ultimately – there are only two ways to live: there are two paths; there are two gates; there are two destinations and there are two groups of people (see Matthew 7:13–14)  In the passages for today we see starkly contrasting ways of life
itunes:title: Day 114: Two Ways to Live
itunes:subtitle: Psalm 50:16–23, Joshua 5:13–15, 7:20–22, Luke 22:39–62. ’Jesus himself said that – ultimately – there are only two ways to live: there are two paths; there are two gates; there are two destinations and there are two groups of people (see Matthew 7:13–14)  In the passages for today we see starkly contrasting ways of life
itunes:summary:
Albert Einstein said, ‘There are only two ways to live your life. One is as though nothing is a miracle. The other is as though everything is a miracle.’
Jesus himself said that – ultimately – there are only two ways to live: there are two paths; there are two gates; there are two destinations and there are two groups of people (see Matthew 7:13–14). In the passages for today we see starkly contrasting ways of life.
itunes:author: Nicky and Pippa Gumbel
